channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
Hi everyone I am trying to make my own server, and i initially did it on XP and then transferred my files to my vista laptop, I have done enviromental variables, and port forwarding, and i've got no-ip and utorrent. i run server then i try and connect from mopar cause i get that stupid Connection error retrying in ... on silab. ran server opened no-ip then utorrent then tried 127.0.0.1 and after i did all that i got this in my runserver cmd.
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:277) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:167) at server.main(server.java:109) Connection from 127.0.0.1:49383 [client-1-Yoshi]: Failed to load player: Yoshi ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:49384 [client-1-Yoshi]: Failed to load player: Yoshi ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:49385 [client-1-Yoshi]: Failed to load player: Yoshi ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:49386 [client-1-Yoshi]: Failed to load player: Yoshi ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:49401 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) BANNING HOST 127.0.0.1 (flooding) java.io.FileNotFoundException: http://dodian.com/ban.php?host=127.0.0.1 at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(HttpURLCon nection.java:1288) at server.openPage(server.java:153) at server.banHost(server.java:182) at server.checkHost(server.java:205) at server.run(server.java:283) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Rejected 127.0.0.1:49402 ClientHandler: Rejected 127.0.0.1:49404 ClientHandler: Rejected 127.0.0.1:49405 ClientHandler: Rejected 127.0.0.1:49447 [/code]

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“rune mate99, post:13, topic:258201”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=340926.msg2640072#msg2640072 date=1232801093]

Ignore everything that was said above for a second.

" Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6
at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:277)
at ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:167)
at server.main(server.java:109)"

Whenever you see this, it means that you used a space in your ItemHandler.Java…instead of tabs. ALWAYS use tabs. Go through your ItemHandler.Java and find where you put a space.

Also, the reason you are flooding is because of the error. The error will not let you log in, so I suggest you fix the error.

Good luck!
~Jc22493

^ JUST DO THIS. I AM 100% SURE ON THIS. ^
[/quote]

I tried that i went through it and there’s no spaces, should i make them all just normal . I don’t think thats because of spaces, because i HAVENT changed anything in there. I relly dk whats going on[/quote]
It HAS to be in ItemHandler.Java. That error only relates to that. Maybe you did put an extra space, but didn’t notice.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Tha_Hartpaint_Dude Tha Hartpaint Dude
item.description:
@Tha_Hartpaint_Dude wrote:

[quote=“rune mate99, post:8, topic:258201”][quote author=Tha Hartpaint Dude link=topic=340926.msg2640030#msg2640030 date=1232797058]

remove you’re name from ban list in data folder.

Try to change your JDK in

Run.bat>right click>edit.

Cheers,
The hartpaint team.

I’m not n there

Un-Ban yourself. If the problem is still doing the same, just say it or download a new source.

Cheers,

The hartpaint team.

But the source works on XP not vista wtf tho?

If it doesn’t work on Vista… Dude than it’s normal that it doesn’t works :s

Cheers,
The hartpaint team
[/quote]

What? i had set it all up on my XP comp then i just copied it over here to my vista laptop. now when i go runserver it comes up with that error, on other comp i go runserver, and it works, all good

[/quote]

Read full topic
